text: Glory to Us, Death to the Enemy () is a 1914 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yevgeni Bauer.Госфильмофонд поделился с Президентской библиотекой в Петербурге уникальными кинолентамиСлава — нам, смерть — врагам It stars Ivan Mozzhukhin and Dora Tschitorina. == Actors == * Ivan Mozzhukhin as Her groom, officer * Dora Tschitorina as Charity Sister == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1914 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yevgeni Bauer
title: Glory to Us, Death to the Enemy
